adeptus_astartes.name: Adeptus Astartes
adeptus_astartes.lore: The Adeptus Astartes - the Space Marines - are some of the Emperor's finest warriors, created using advanced genetic science few others understand. In His absence, the Marines follow His primarch son's written teachings on the conquest of the stars - the Codex Astartes

rules.Oath of Moment: At the start of your Command phase, select one unit from your opponent’s army. Until the start of your next Command phase, each time a +Star Marines+ model from your army makes an attack that targets that enemy unit, you can re-roll the Hit roll and you can re-roll the Wound roll.

heretic_astartes.name: Heretic Astartes
heretic_astartes.lore: Ten thousand years ago, as the Emperor and his Space Marines were on the cusp of uniting the galaxy, some of the Marines fell to dark powers. They revolted against their father, plunging the fledgling Imperium into civil war.

rules.Dark Pacts:
Each time a +Heretic Astartes+ unit is selected to shoot or fight, it can make a Dark Pact. If it does, select one of the following abilities for that unit’s weapons to gain until the end of the phase:
* +[LETHAL HITS]+
* +[SUSTAINED HITS 1]+
Each time a unit makes a Dark Pact, after it has resolved its attacks, it must take a leadership test; if that test is failed, that unit suffers D3 mortal wounds.

orcs.name: Orcs
orcs.lore: The infamous war cry of the Orx is known and feared throughout the galaxy. When it echoes across the battelfield, bellowed from thousands of barbaric mouths, even the most stoic warriors fear the onslaught to come.

rules.WAAAAGH!:
Once per battle, at the start of a battle round, call a WAAAAGH. If you do, until the start of the next battle round:
* Your +Orcs+ units are eligible to both Advance and Charge in the same turn.
* Add 1 to the Attacks and Strength properties of melee weapons equipped by your +Orx+ models.
* Your +Orcs+ models have a 5++ Invulnerable Save.
